DOC.brief_summary: The objective study conduct randomize control trial evaluate impact Triple P clinic practice pediatric resident select parent child outcomes . This study accomplish overarch goal address two specific aim . Aim 1 . Triple P 's Effect Pediatric Resident 's Practice : test effect Triple P training practice pediatric resident address manage psychosocial problem . Hypothesis 1 : At completion trial , resident assign intervention group , compare resident expose control condition , : 1. increase skill level , 2. increase confidence , 3. increase satisfaction deal manage psychosocial issue Aim 2 . Triple P 's Effect Parent Child Outcomes : test effect Triple P intervention parent 's feeling self efficacy , parent 's discipline strategies child 's externalize behavior . Hypothesis 2 : At completion intervention , parent child receive intervention , compare receive control condition , : 1. great reduction target child behavior problem , 2. great reduction dysfunctional parenting practice , 3. increase use appropriate discipline positive parenting strategy , 4. great confidence parent ability .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Pediatric Resident : Assigned participate continuity clinic Exclusion Criteria Pediatric Resident : Not assign participate continuity clinic Inclusion Criteria Parent : Parent eligible child . Speaks English Exclusion Criteria Parent : A parent ineligible child NonEnglish speaking Inclusion Criteria Child : Treated participate resident Between 18 month 12 year old Does mental health diagnosis Is receive medication therapy professional Exclusion Criteria Child : Not treat participate resident Age fall outside eligible range Has mental health diagnosis Currently receive medication therapy professional
